actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 8344 of title 5, United States Code, to require Government agencies to deposit in the general fund of the U.S. Treasury the amount of annuity payments withheld by them from the salaries of certain reemployed annuitants.

summary.text: Requires Government agencies to deposit in the general fund of the United States Treasury the amount of annuity payments withheld by them from the salaries of specified reemployed annuitants. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8344(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8344 of title 5, United States Code, to require Government agencies to deposit in the general fund of the U.S. Treasury the amount of annuity payments withheld by them from the salaries of certain reemployed annuitants.
